caseTitle: Govt of Pakistan, Ministry of Housing & Works through Joint Estate Officer, Peshawar v. Malik Safeer Ahmed
tagline: Any order made or proceedings taken in respect of an official accommodation, pursuant to the applicable rules, regulations, policies, instructions, directions etc., Shall not be called before any Court, except  the forums provided therein. However, if such forum is not provided, a High Court, if it is satisfied, exercise its power, as provided by Article 199 of the Constitution.
